bug.short_desc: Changing the font size within a list does not work correctly

long_desc.thetext:
Steps to reproduce this issue
1. Open the htmlarea 2. Delete all text (optional) 3. Insert three or more list items and text 4. Select more than one list item (one need to select over list items across) 5. Change the font size
The result is in IE and Firefox browser different, but both are not showing the expected result which should be that the selected text is formatted with the new font size. Additionally the list items itself do have the wrong size since the size is also applied to them resulting in e.g. a font size of "6px". But the with "6" the "size" attribute of the font is targeted.
